domain.en: Exorcism, protection from plagues, safeguarding communities

description.zh-TW: 王爺信仰盛行於台灣沿海，主祀驅邪消災。
description.en: Wangye worship is popular in coastal Taiwan, mainly for exorcism and protection.

story.zh-TW: 王爺多為歷史名臣或忠義之士，死後受封為神。
story.en: Wangye are often deified loyal officials or heroes, worshipped after death.

description.zh-TW: 保生大帝為醫藥之神，保佑健康平安。
description.en: Baosheng Dadi is the god of medicine, blessing health and safety.

story.zh-TW: 原為宋代名醫吳本，濟世救人，死後受祀。
story.en: Originally a famous Song dynasty doctor, deified for his benevolence.

description.zh-TW: 三太子為勇敢的少年神，深受兒童喜愛。
description.en: Nezha is a brave young deity, beloved by children.

story.zh-TW: 哪吒鬧海、降妖除魔，故事廣為流傳。
story.en: Famous for subduing demons and his legendary adventures.

description.zh-TW: 虎爺為動物神，常見於廟宇神桌下方。
description.en: Tiger Lord is an animal deity, often found under temple altars.

story.zh-TW: 傳說虎爺能驅邪避凶，守護信眾。
story.en: Said to ward off evil and protect worshippers.

description.zh-TW: 註生娘娘主司生育，婦女常祈求子嗣。
description.en: Goddess of birth and fertility, prayed to by women for children.

story.zh-TW: 傳說註生娘娘能賜子送子，保佑母子平安。
story.en: Said to grant children and ensure safe childbirth.

domain.zh-TW: 家庭、婦女、土地公的配偶

description.zh-TW: 土地婆為土地公的配偶，主司家庭與婦女。
description.en: Tudipo is the wife of Tudigong, goddess of family and women.

story.zh-TW: 土地婆協助土地公庇佑地方，守護家庭。
story.en: Assists Tudigong in protecting the land and families.
